@arthurkaruletwa. Hi,Arthur...Thank you!
@opio1970. All you said very true-cant be said better... Thank you!
@pkuiper. Wud you kindly ask those who circulated the false reports to come clean on it since they have turned out to be lies please!
@pkuiper. I was waiting to hear about that from the 'more civilised n enlightened' ones who want to hold the rest of the world accountable..
@pkuiper ...except themselves...of course!!!
@pkuiper. I have waited to kno,of what significance,are these pple,that wud put them at such risk of any threat-politcl or otherwise ....
@pkuiper ...to no avail. Or in all honesty why wud the suspect in the intended crime,be let free..and only resort to accusations!
@pkuiper I still believe pple out there,in the media or elsewhere,esp any govt are wiser than to be duped and believe this nonsense!
@pkuiper...of course that is if some of these pple are not themselves interested parties in creating this falsehood! Dont ask me why....!
@arthurkaruletwa. Yess I received the book...say hi and thanks to H.S as well!
@Opiaiya. Let me respond to the China question by asking and saying; why in this day and age,wud Africa be a place to entertain colonialism
@BegbyIL Thank you for visiting you.
@Opiaiya. And btw..the old colonialism has disappeared yet-not quite...! It wud just mean the new of china adding to the old of others..
@Opiaiya. The onus is on Africa ...!
@Opiaiya. There will alwz be pple to colonize Africa if that what we want...
@Opiaiya. We can also fight it ...and succeed as has been the case b4...but we have to stay the course!
Today we say goodbye to Ricardo Rivadeneira. A man of good will, of convictions, of consensus and deep vocation of public service.
Ricardo Rivadeneira never bowed to the powerful and was always kind to the weak. Today I say goodbye to an admired and dear friend.

1st cabinet meeting: "Sacrifices have to be made to save the country through adhering to democracy in various elections"
First cabinet session was primarily aimed at forming a committee of 8 ministers designed to draft the policy statement
The ministerial statement must be based on the constants, the Taif Constitution and the letter of the oath. We have proved that we can resolve our own affairs
Suleiman: I wish the ministers to expedite the receipt of their ministry and start work, especially as we are on the doors of the summer season

Happy #FathersDay. For many children, their father is their first superhero. He protects, guides and inspires a child.
#FathersDay He is the first male role-model a child encounters. His behaviour determines their relationship with other male figures.
On this #FathersDay take responsibility for your children. Be that superhero. Happy #FathersDay

"If we want to leave the economic dependence first we have to put order in our house" http://t.co/CjyoQNo
"We had three choices: first bankruptcy, second the exit from the euro, third aid from the support mechanism we created"
"I have struggled to create a European support mechanism from scratch and we have won this battle with the Greek people"
"It is easy to flatter them all and to say we failed, but the sacrifices of the Greek people have taken place" http://t.co/CjyoQNo
"The new government has the first task of finalizing the negotiation. The Greek government's funds will soon end"
"Beyond the negotiation, we are aiming for fiscal consolidation, the state stopping spending more than it produces"
"The real problem of the country is the unequal burden sharing in society, and we need national consensus to change it"
"At the top of our priorities is the creation of a new Constitution." http://t.co/CjyoQNo
"Articles of the Constitution such as Ministers' Liability Limitation must be permanently deleted" http://t.co/CjyoQNo
"In autumn we will go to a referendum on the major changes to be made at the site" http://t.co/CjyoQNo
"For growth we put forward a huge program of utilizing the property of the state in an absolutely transparent way"
"We are going to expand the online prescription" http://t.co/CjyoQNo
"Let's give our best to create a different Greece We will all change from this process"
